entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
